system.description:
At 9th level you’ve mastered and branched out from basic chemistry, discovering a new science to integrate into your tactics. You may add your Intelligence modifier to the saving throw DC of any item you create using Tactical Chemistry.

Humanoid Biochemistry

You’ve learned a great deal of biochemistry and what chemicals you can apply to alleviate many ailments. You can create the following additional items using your Tactical Chemistry feature:

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.vzy6r3gv8ylwoim7]{Antitoxin}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.nees9nzonritxzwe]{Healing Potion (greater)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.x9t8xc1kffdnm5nz]{Laudanum}
